channel.title: Help on makeing a server tut needed here please
channel.description:
ok chapter 5 says if i dont use linksys router then go to the link but since i do have it do i skip the whole chapter or do this?::::Chapter 5
Open your cmd by going to Start > Run > cmd. Type in `ipconfig´ It will say your default gateway, so type that in your browser and you will get a login screen. Skip the username part and fill in `admin´ at the password field. Click the Applications & Gaming tab and fill in the things. (Don't have? You don't use linksys, read first part of chapter) Start 43594 End 43594 Proctol = Both IP Address = Your IP And make sure you enable it!

item.title: Help on makeing a server tut needed here please
item.dc:creator: @zxr3d_h0txz zxr3d h0txz
item.description:
@zxr3d_h0txz wrote:

ok chapter 5 says if i dont use linksys router then go to the link but since i do have it do i skip the whole chapter or do this?::::Chapter 5

Open your cmd by going to Start > Run > cmd.
Type in ipconfig´ It will say your default gateway, so type that in your browser and you will get a login screen. Skip the username part and fill inadmin´ at the password field.
Click the Applications & Gaming tab and fill in the things. (Don’t have? You don’t use linksys, read first part of chapter)
Start 43594
End 43594
Proctol = Both
IP Address = Your IP
And make sure you enable it!

Read full topic
item.source: Help on makeing a server tut needed here please
